lines.text:
[after looking after a liquor store named "Pepes Bodega" throughout the movie]
I found Pepes Bodega!
Where?
Now we have rum for the Christmas party!
Yeah, yeah, but where?
Here!
HERE?
Yeah, It's on the other side of the hotel!

[as mantra through the movie]
I CAN fly, I am NOT afraid!

[after checking out a beautiful girl]
LA-TA-DA-TA-DA!
How are you?
Well, I was sober this morning, but now it's starting to get all right.
Do you want a little nip?
No, I can't stand alcohol.

[takes a sip of his vodka]
Who the hell can?
Don't you have any baggage?
Hell yeah, I got it here!
[brings up a small transparent bag]

[laughs]
Is that it?
Yeah, I'm easy-going.
Damn, they are still closed! It's almost ten o'clock!
But shouldn't we eat breakfast first?
We are doing that right now, bacon and egg-liquor!
[laughs]

[driving through customs with Berra sleeping in a wheelchair]
Invalido.
